this Court on 13-07-2023, seeking: pronounced  by  the  Provincial  High  Court  on  28-04-2023.  The  petitioner  has
failed to explain such a delay in filing the petition before this Court. I am of the
view  that  stating  that  the  COVID  pandemic  prevented  him  from  filing  this
application  when  this  matter  was  raised  before  this  Court  would  not  be  a
sufficient explanation for such a delay, as the said pandemic was not prevalent
at  that  time  to  a  level  which  prevented  a  person  from  asserting  his  rights.
Although the question of delay is a subjective thing, which may vary depending
on  the  facts  and  the  circumstances  unique  to  each  case,  I  do  not  find  that
sufficient explanation has been provided in the instant matter for the delay.
